byline.contributor: Myra Noveck contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Israeli authorities investigate video of Jewish extremists seemingly celebrating killing of Palestinian child in July 2015 arson attack.
lead_paragraph: Officials said they were investigating the video, taken at a wedding. Guests there appeared to be cheering the death of 18-month-old Ali Dawabsheh.

headline.main: Video Shows Israeli Extremists Celebrating Palestinian Child’s Death
headline.print_headline: Video Indicates Jewish Extremists Celebrated Palestinian Boy’s Death

snippet: Officials said they were investigating the video, taken at a wedding. Guests there appeared to be cheering the death of 18-month-old Ali Dawabsheh.
